00001 using System;
00002 using System.Collections;
00003 using System.ComponentModel;
00004 using System.Data;

00006 using System.Web;

00008 using System.Web.UI;
00009 using System.Web.UI.WebControls;
00010 using System.Web.UI.HtmlControls;
00011 using PMT.Controls;
00012 using PMTComponents;
00013 using PMTDataProvider;
00014 
00015 namespace PMT.Admin
00016 {
00017     public class ChangeUser : Page
00018     {
00019         protected ProfileControl ProfileControl1;
00020         protected Button Submit;
00021         protected Button Cancel;
00022         private PMTUser user;
00023 
00024         private void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00025         {
00026             IDataProvider conn = DataProvider.CreateInstance();
00027 
00028             if (this.UserType.Equals("new"))
00029             {
00030                 //new user handling here
00031                 //need to move the new user info to the users table
00032                 conn.EnablePMTUser(this.UserID, new TransactionFailedHandler(this.TransactionFailed));
00033             }
00034             else if (this.UserType.Equals("current"))
00035             {
00036                 //current user handling here
00037                 user = conn.GetPMTUserById(this.UserID);
00038             }
00039 
00040             if(!Page.IsPostBack)
00041             {
00042                 //what to do when the page is loaded fresh
00043                 //set the control to show admin field set
00044                 //then fill it with the appropriate user information
00045                 ProfileControl1.AdminView = true;
00046                 ProfileControl1.fillForm(conn.GetPMTUserById(this.UserID));
00047             }
00048         }
00049 
00050         #region Web Form Designer generated code
00051         override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e)
00052         {
00053             //
00054             // CODEGEN: This call is required by the ASP.NET Web Form Designer.
00055             //
00056             InitializeComponent();
00057             base.OnInit(e);
00058         }
00059         
00064         private void InitializeComponent()
00065         {    
00066             this.Submit.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.Submit_Click);
00067             this.Cancel.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.Cancel_Click);
00068             this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load);
00069 
00070         }
00071         #endregion
00072 
00073         private void Submit_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00074         {
00075             IDataProvider conn = DataProvider.CreateInstance();
00076 
00077             //store new user information to database
00078             user = conn.GetPMTUserById(this.UserID);
00079             ProfileControl1.fillUser(user);
00080             conn.UpdatePMTUser(user, new TransactionFailedHandler(this.TransactionFailed));
00081         }
00082 
00083         private void Cancel_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00084         {
00085             //cancel user profile editing, return to user list page
00086             Response.Redirect("userList.aspx");
00087         }
00088 
00089         private void TransactionFailed(Exception ex)
00090         {
00091             Response.WriteFile(String.Format("Update failed. Error {0}", ex.Message));
00092         }
00093 
00097         public int UserID
00098         {
00099             get {   return Convert.ToInt32(Request.QueryString["id"]);  }
00100         }
00101 
00105         public string UserType
00106         {
00107             get {   return Request.QueryString["type"]; }
00108         }
00109     }
00110 }
